DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the postoperative pain after general anesthesia of orbital diseases and ocular tumor patients.
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Pain in Orbital Disease and Ocular Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to evaluate patients diagnosed of orbital diseases or ocular tumor over 16 years old of the postoperative pain after general anesthesia , and to analyze the related factors of pain after operation.
DOC.criteria: over 16 years old diagnosed as orbital disease or ocular tumor surgery under general anesthesia any uncontrolled clinical problems
